author: Grant Graves "semi-consumer"

review: This is the absolute best idea ever! We own two of these and have given them out as Christmas presents. We love watching youtube videos and this makes it ten times easier. We've had occasional issues with it disconnecting, but nothing major that couldn't be fixed. We really love that is so easy to use. Simply look for the icon on your desktop, laptop, tablet, or phone and you can connect it to your TV.Must have for any home!
author: Jennifer

review: I have a Roku, a smart TV, and two Chromecasts.  Out of all of them, the Chromecasts are my favorite.  It is so much easier to find something using my phone and sending it to the TV as opposed to using my remote to type out what I am looking for.  It's to the point where I refuse to use video apps if they do not allow casting (hello, Amazon Video).  And you simply can't beat the price.  Yes, I have two and want a third.
author: andrewt522 "Andrew T. Mason"
